sources.title: The Phantom Light
sources.description: Title: The Phantom Light Summary: A lighthouse keeper has been murdered in mysterious circumstances and, during the ensuing investigation a Phantom Light keeps appearing at the scene of his death. Directed by: Michael Powell Actors: Binnie Hale, Gordon Harker, Donald Calthrop Production Company: Gainsborough Pictures Release Date: 5 August 1935 (UK) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 A lighthouse keeper has been murdered in mysterious circumstances and, during the ensuing investigation a Phantom Light keeps appearing at the scene of his death.

metadata.Plot: A lighthouse keeper has been murdered in mysterious circumstances and, during the ensuing investigation a Phantom Light keeps appearing at the scene of his death.
metadata.Writer: Evadne Price, Joan Roy Byford, Ralph Smart
metadata.Actors: Binnie Hale, Gordon Harker, Donald Calthrop
